entry.title: White House Signs 8 More Companies to its Safe AI Pledge
entry.summary: NVIDIA, IBM, and Adobe are among the eight companies promising to focus on safety, security, and trust in advancing artificial intelligence.

entry.title: Rising Interest Rates Could Actually Pump Bitcoin: Arthur Hayes
entry.summary: Bitcoin’s price may rise if central banks worldwide continue tightening monetary policies, according to the BitMEX co-founder.

entry.title: Apple iPhone 15 Pro Will Have Ray Tracing, Support Ubisoft and Capcom Games
entry.summary: Apple calls the forthcoming iPhone 15 Pro “a monster win for gaming.”

entry.title: AI Firms Should Adopt KYC Policies to Combat Misuse, Microsoft Exec Suggests
entry.summary: Microsoft President Brad Smith suggests banking-style identity verification could stem abuse and misinformation.

entry.title: Fortress CEO Clears the Air on Security Breach and Stolen Funds
entry.summary: Scott Purcell admits that “shit happened”—but says Fortress and Ripple handled things well.

entry.title: Champions Arena Beginner's Guide: How to Start Playing the NFT Fantasy Game
entry.summary: Looking to dive into a mobile RPG with optional NFTs? Here's how to get started in Gala Games' Champions Arena.

entry.title: Sony Reveals Blockchain Plans to 'Connect Souls Across Generations'
entry.summary: Sony subsidiary Sony Network Communications has established a joint venture with Startale Labs, makers of the Astar blockchain.

entry.title: AI Deepfakes Pose ‘Real Risk’ to Markets, Says SEC Chair Gary Gensler
entry.summary: Wall Street’s top regulator is again warning about the dangers of AI.

entry.title: Are AI Models Approaching Consciousness? New Research Reignites Debate
entry.summary: With "sophisticated out-of-context reasoning," AI can tell humans what they want to hear—before changing course.

entry.title: 'Bitboy' Ben Armstrong Files Suit Against Former Hit Network Colleagues
entry.summary: The crypto influencer has sued those who ousted him from his media brand and its parent company.

entry.title: House Republicans Reintroduce Bill to Outlaw Digital Dollar CBDC
entry.summary: Introduced by House Majority Whip Tom Emmer, the updated anti-CBDC bill includes new provisions not in the original version from February.

entry.title: The Crypties Returns for 2023 to Celebrate Crypto's Top Projects and Creators
entry.summary: The premier crypto industry awards ceremony is back—and token holders get to vote on who wins The Crypties.

entry.title: LACMA's Latest NFT Experiment Brings Fresh Eyes to Paul Klee's Art
entry.summary: A new generative art collection by William Mapan is the latest in a LACMA series that invites digital artists to engage with classic works.

entry.title: Gensler Slams Crypto Markets as Lawmakers Raise Questions About Bitcoin ETF
entry.summary: SEC Chair Gary Gensler was asked Tuesday by the Senate Banking Committee what he needs to see in a filing to approve a spot Bitcoin ETF.

entry.title: Aaron Rodgers Injury Sends DraftKings NFTs Soaring for Backup QB
entry.summary: NFTs associated with the Jets' backup QB surged on Monday after Aaron Rodgers fell to a season-ending injury.

entry.title: Franklin Templeton Latest Wall Street Giant to File for Bitcoin ETF
entry.summary: Franklin Templeton is the latest high-profile fund manager hoping to get a spot Bitcoin ETF approved by the SEC.

entry.title: Solana Support Comes to MetaMask With Solflare Integration
entry.summary: After years of incompatibility, a new bridge allows Solana portfolios to be managed directly from the popular Web3 wallet.

entry.title: Optimism Flips Arbitrum Market Cap Amid Crypto Market Downturn
entry.summary: The market caps of two leading Ethereum layer-2 tokens flipped during Monday’s negative crypto price action.

entry.title: Diesel Offers Access to Milan Fashion Week Show With Latest NFT Drop
entry.summary: The Diesel x Public Pressure drop on Polkadot and Polygon offers various perks, including a ticket to the fashion brand's next runway.

entry.title: Unicorn Avatar Startup Genies Reveals $500K Digital Fashion Fund
entry.summary: Genies will give digital fashion creators a chance to earn cash while potentially co-creating with artists like Khalid and Banks.

entry.title: Flatcoins 'New Thing On the Horizon': Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong
entry.summary: Flatcoins are a type of stablecoin designed to move in line with inflation, instead of being pegged to a currency or asset.

entry.title: Former Celsius Boss Mashinsky Seeks to Have FTC Case Dropped
entry.summary: Alex Mashinsky’s lawyers argue that the FTC case against the former CEO of the Celsius Network should be dismissed.

entry.title: PayPal Launches Crypto to USD Off-Ramps
entry.summary: The launch of the new feature follows PayPal's introduction last month of a crypto on-ramp service through MetaMask and Ledger.

entry.title: Vitalik Buterin: SIM Swap Attack Behind $700,000 Twitter Hack
entry.summary: The Ethereum co-founder’s account was hacked and used to promote a fake NFT giveaway that stole $691,000 from his followers.

entry.title: People Won't Use Bitcoin To Buy Things, Says PayPal Co-Founder
entry.summary: David Marcus says Bitcoin's lightning network will be a universal money protocol for transacting multiple currencies.

entry.title: Google Launches $20 Million Fund to Support Responsible AI Development
entry.summary: The Digital Futures Project aims to include diverse perspectives in AI development, tackling bias, fairness, and workforce impact.

entry.title: AI's Thirst for Power May Be Draining Water Supplies
entry.summary: Bitcoin mining isn't the only environmental scourge—time to rage against AI.

entry.title: Ethereum Is Losing Favor Among Institutional Investors: CoinShares
entry.summary: With $108 million worth of selling in 2023, it is the “least loved digital asset.”

entry.title: Gensler Decries ‘Wide-Ranging Noncompliance’ In Crypto Ahead of Oversight Testimony
entry.summary: Despite bipartisan criticism for his agency’s approach to crypto, SEC Chair Gary Gensler is doubling down.

entry.title: Bitfinex and Tether CTO Paolo Ardoino to Testify in Market Manipulation Lawsuit
entry.summary: Ardoino will be deposed this week after the court denied his counsel’s request for more time to prepare.

entry.title: Bitcoin Drops to 3-Month Low While Ethereum Takes Harder Hit
entry.summary: The price slump comes as bankrupt crypto exchange FTX looks to liquidate its crypto holdings.

entry.title: Tesla Up 10% on Prediction Its AI Chips Will Outperform Nvidia's
entry.summary: Tesla's new supercomputing system could position it as a strong rival to NVIDIA, according to Morgan Stanley.

entry.title: AI Is Racist, Experts Say. Here's Why
entry.summary: AI has the ability to be racist if left unchecked, and it could mean terrible things for our future, according to AI builders.

entry.title: Hologram Runway Wows Crowds at Amsterdam Fashion Week
entry.summary: Future Front Row seeks to chart an immersion-first path forward for the digital fashion industry after packing the house in Amsterdam.

entry.title: Pahdo Labs Raises $15M to Let Players Make Anime Games With AI Tools
entry.summary: The studio behind anime game Halcyon Zero will launch generative AI tools for content creation after raising funding led by Andreessen Horowitz.

entry.title: Meta Is Building AI Data Centers to Power ChatGPT Competitor: WSJ
entry.summary: A person familiar with Meta said the company has hired a new team and is stocking a data center with Nvidia H100s to compete with OpenAI.

author.name: Decrypt AI, Edited by Stacy Elliot

entry.title: Microsoft Reveals Xbox Mastercard That Helps You Earn Free Games
entry.summary: Barclays will begin issuing Xbox Mastercards to select U.S. applicants later this month, allowing holders to earn points for gaming perks.

entry.title: Sushi Expands to Aptos in 'Milestone' Move
entry.summary: The move to Aptos is the first time DEX has been accessible on a blockchain that is not compatible with the Ethereum Virtual Machine.

entry.title: FTX Looks to Offload Billions in Crypto: Here’s What it Means
entry.summary: The defunct crypto exchange is seeking regulatory approval to liquidate $3.4 billion worth of crypto assets.

entry.title: How Mino Games is Using Artificial Intelligence
entry.summary: Mino Games CEO Sasha McKinnon tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how the studio's upcoming game Dimensionals will use real-time AI.

entry.title: INTERVIEW: How Will Aurory Use NFTs and Crypto?
entry.summary: Michael Natoli, Aurory's Head of Marketing and Business Development, tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how the Aurory games will use NFTs and crypto and shares the studio's broader stance on the tech.

entry.title: Google Cloud's James Tromans on the Intersection of AI and Web3
entry.summary: Google's Global Head of Google Cloud for Web3 James Tromans sat down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson to discuss how AI can help Web3 companies come to market faster and the real value of Web3 tools.

entry.title: Mastering NFT Trading - Degen U
entry.summary: Take Degen U's new course, Mastering NFT Trading, and earn an on-chain certificate. A top instructor will help you identify trends, seize the right moment to trade, weed out scams—and have fun while doing it!

entry.title: Space Nation CEO on Working With 'Independence Day' Director Roland Emmerich
entry.summary: Jerome Wu, CEO of Space Nation, tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the upcoming Space Nation Online game in development and shares details on Space Nation Cofounder Roland Emmerich's role in the project.

entry.title: GAME REVIEW: Champions Arena from Gala Games
entry.summary: Champions Arena is a turn-based fantasy RPG from Gala Games, where characters can become NFTs and crypto can be used to purchase gems, one of the game's synthetic currencies. Decrypt's Kate Irwin takes us inside the game for her thoughts on the fun, mobile-first title.

entry.title: Apex Legends Voice Actor Ben Prendergast on the Future of Gaming
entry.summary: Voice actor Ben Prendergast, who's voiced characters in games like Apex Legends and God of War Ragnarok, shares his opinions on the tech space's history of "bubbles" and whether blockchain gaming has a future.

entry.title: The future of AI Stardom and Robotics with SingularityNET COO Janet Adams and Desdemona
entry.summary: In this interview, SingularityNET COO Janet Adams explains the intricate details that went into creating the Desdemona robot AI from Hanson Robotics and future plans for the AI Diva.

entry.title: Crypto a 'No-Brainer' for Video Games, Says Mino Games CEO
entry.summary: Mino Games CEO Sasha MacKinnon, developer of the upcoming Dimensionals game, tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the studio's approach to digital collectibles.

entry.title: Michael Wagner's 'Controversial Take' on Crypto in Games
entry.summary: At Solana's PlayGG, Star Atlas CEO Michael Wagner shares his "controversial take" on crypto in games, shares the challenges of developing the upcoming scifi game, and how crypto's volatility has changed his perspective with Decrypt's Jason Nelson.

entry.title: Interview: Angelic CEO on Building the Sci-Fi RPG on Solana and Ethereum
entry.summary: Angelic is a sci-fi roleplay game in development that will be free-to-play and offer optional, opt-in crypto features on Solana and Ethereum and a governance token. Metaverse Game Studios CEO and Founder Erkan Bayol tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how he sees AAA traditional games as Angelic's main competitors and shares his vision for the game.

entry.title: Apex Legends Voice Actor on AI's Impact on Video Games
entry.summary: Ben Prendergast is an actor who has voiced characters like Apex Legends' Fuse, God of War Ragnarok's Tyr, and Patroclus in Hades. But as debates swirl around the use of artificial intelligence in entertainment in light of the SAG-AFTRA and WGA strikes, Prendergast gives Decrypt's Kate Irwin his honest take on the potential use of AI actors in games.

entry.title: Star Atlas CEO on Developing an MMO Game
entry.summary: Decrypt's Jason Nelson speaks with Star Atlas Founder and CEO Michael Wagner about the MMO game's approach to development, marketing, and blockchain integrations.

entry.title: Aurory's Origin Story: How JRPGs Inspired the Games
entry.summary: Decrypt's Jason Nelson talks to Aurory's Head of Marketing and Business Development Michael Natoli about the origins of the Aurory crypto games at the Solana PlayGG event.
